Name: Glitchy Goldbyte
Description: Glitchy Goldbyte was once the centerpiece of a high-tech amusement arcade, basking in the limelight of children's laughter and neon glows. However, after a fateful power surge, Goldbyte's screen shattered, leaving a web of cracks that now only display a fragmented world. Despite this setback, Goldbyte became a legend in the WebtrES club for being the most upbeat and resilient member, always finding a way to entertain and inspire with tales of the arcade era and the mysterious digital realms beyond the screen.
